titleStmt.title: Some brief observations upon George Keith's earnest expostulation contained in a postscript to a late book of his, entituled, The antichrists and sadducees detected, &c. Offered to the perusal of such as the said expostulation was recommended to. By E. P.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Edward, 1667-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle, in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-Street,

notesStmt.note: Work signed at end: Edward Penington.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
